channel.title: Comments on: Where in the WoW?

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Yar, the Master's Cellar. Dim lighting, a cool temperature and undead guards -- all are important for proper storage of fine virtual wine.
item.content:encoded: Yar, the Master’s Cellar. Dim lighting, a cool temperature and undead guards — all are important for proper storage of fine virtual wine.

item.title: By: Oz
item.dc:creator: Oz
item.description: Ah, you're right, and these bottles are HUGE, if I remember correctly? I remember doing the key quest and thinking "how big was old Medivh?"
item.content:encoded: Ah, you’re right, and these bottles are HUGE, if I remember correctly? I remember doing the key quest and thinking “how big was old Medivh?”

item.title: By: Laura
item.dc:creator: Laura
item.description: The cleanliness of that cellar leaves much to be desired.
item.content:encoded: The cleanliness of that cellar leaves much to be desired.

item.title: By: Lono
item.dc:creator: Lono
item.description: Master cellar, those specters have been so much of a pain
item.content:encoded: Master cellar, those specters have been so much of a pain

item.title: By: Groovymarlin
item.dc:creator: Groovymarlin
item.description: Definitely the Master's Cellar, underground just outside Karazhan. Part of the attunement quests for entering Kz.
item.content:encoded: Definitely the Master’s Cellar, underground just outside Karazhan. Part of the attunement quests for entering Kz.

item.title: By: Brent Michael Krupp
item.dc:creator: Brent Michael Krupp
item.description:
Nah, those are giant kegs.
This is down under the ruins outside of Karazhan, I think.
item.content:encoded:
Nah, those are giant kegs.

This is down under the ruins outside of Karazhan, I think.

item.title: By: Oz
item.dc:creator: Oz
item.description: For some reason, that room in BRD with the drunk guy you kill for a bag is what comes to mind.
item.content:encoded: For some reason, that room in BRD with the drunk guy you kill for a bag is what comes to mind.
